sentences.sContent: The table’s about this high and this wide.
sentences.sCn: 那桌子大约有这么高，这么宽。

sentences.sContent: You need to cut about this much off the end of the pipe.
sentences.sCn: 你要从管子头上切下大约这么多。

trans.tranOther: used to say how big, how much etc, when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands
